text: On March 5, 2023, the patient was prescribed Tylenol 500mg for pain relief. Simvastatin 20mg was added to the medication regimen on June 10, 2023, to manage cholesterol levels. The doctor recommended taking Benadryl 25mg as needed for allergies starting in August 2023. The pharmacist suggested Zantac for acid reflux, beginning October 15, 2023. The patient's next appointment is scheduled for January 20, 2024
